comment.body:
i have been searching for "accepted_domains" string in all zite files, and can not find it. My zite is recently clonned ZeroTalk.

zaronet/data/mysite/data/users/content.json contains:
  "cert_signers": {
   "zeroid.bit": ["1iD5ZQJMNXu43w1qLB8sfdHVKppVMduGz"],
   "zeroverse.bit": ["1HPgDoReCFtE9qy71hnp55ksBVvV1gHJLQ"],
   "kaffie.bit": ["1KH5BdNnqxh2KRWMMT8wUXzUgz4vVQ4S8p"],
   "nanasi": ["16KzwuSAjFnivNimSHuRdPrYd1pNPhuHqN"]
  },

I Signed and published changes, but my site authorization box shows only zeroid.bit as an option, please any idea?

The step "1. Install CJDNS" is a bit confusing for a Windows user. I am unsure if i need to follow text starting from "Generate a new config". Maybe you should add sub-sections under "1. Install CJDNS". For example:
A) WINDOWS
B) MAC or LINUX
so it is easier to read. Btw as a noob it also confuse me that i do not see Linux mentioned in the tutorial.
